greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the least k such that k*2*prime(n) + 1 is prime.
comment: Iff a(n) = 1, prime(n) is a Sophie Germain prime, i.e., in A005384. - _A.H.M. Smeets_, Feb 01 2018
link: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[k := 1; While[ ! PrimeQ[2*k*Prime[n] + 1], k++ ]; k, {n, 1, 120}] (* _Stefan Steinerberger_, May 01 2006 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(p=prime(n), k=1); while (!isprime(2*k*p+1), k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 12 2018
results.author: _Don Reble_, Apr 25 2006
